pma:database.name: ID276234_alexprojects
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `ma3_voorstellingen` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `date` date NOT NULL, `day` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `country` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `performance` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `start_hour` time DEFAULT '00:00:00', `end_hour` time DEFAULT NULL, `min_duration` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `location` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `website` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `img` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `alt` text NOT NULL, `type` varchar(256) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=201 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
